section.title: Bean validation (JSR-303)
section.para: Spring Data Graph supports property based validation support. So, whenever a property is changed, it is checked against the annotated constraints (.e.g @Min, @Max, @Size, etc). Validation errors throw a ValidationException. For evaluating the constraints the validation support that comes with Spring is used. To use it a validator has to be registered with the GraphDatabaseContext, if there is none, no validation will be performed (any registered Validator or (Local)ValidatorFactoryBean will be used).
